column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This is a must see while in Chicago!! I would recommend to choose the areas you want to see first if you are on limited time. You could spend days here
column2: for this art institute large and provides great learning for adults and children. For adults and children
column3: there are audio accessible by the art institute app or you can purchase a player at customer service to get the in-depth scripts of collections. The staff is especially helpful and are eager to show you around if you get lost.
